thread.title: NEW VIDEO TUTORIAL: Monster Rigging using 3ds Max Biped

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
NEW VIDEO TUTORIAL FOR 2008: Custom Monster Rigging with 3ds Max Biped and Bones for Doom 3
This video tutorial shows Bone and Biped rigging techniques for custom Doom 3 monsters.

No direct linking to file please, but feel free to host it.

http://www.trepaning.com

post.author: Rayne
post.body: Nice to see you around

post.author: pendragon
post.body: Thanks for all your efforts, Brian

post.author: Neurological
post.body: Nice video, now what we need is also a weapon rigging and importing .

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
Eventhough I don't really need the tutorial, wanted to thank you for the efforts. It's stuff like this that makes our community great.
In fact, I think I owe a lot of my own knowledge to efforts such as this one.

Great job!

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body: Thanks everyone, and always remember, I did it for the lulz.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
This is what I was looking for yes thanks. Now when everyone is using 3dmax and always remember to sing along
Ezekiel cried, "Dem dry bones!"
Ezekiel cried, "Dem dry bones!"
Ezekiel cried, "Dem dry bones!"
"Oh, hear the word of the Lord."

The foot bone connected to the leg bone,
The leg bone connected to the knee bone,
The knee bone connected to the thigh bone,
The thigh bone connected to the back bone,
The back bone connected to the neck bone,
The neck bone connected to the head bone,
Oh, hear the word of the Lord!

Dem bones, dem bones gonna walk aroun',
Dem bones, dem bones, gonna walk aroun'
Dem bones, dem bones, gonna walk aroun'
Oh, hear the word of the Lord.

The head bone connected to the neck bone,
The neck bone connected to the back bone,
The back bone connected to the thigh bone,
The thigh bone connected to the knee bone,
The knee bone connected to the leg bone,
The leg bone connected to the foot bone,
Oh, hear the word of the Lord!

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
Brain Trepaning(tm) Remix 2008

the BoneRWrist is connected to the BoneRLoarm
the BoneRLoarm is connected to the BoneRUparm
the BoneRUparm is connected to the BoneRShol
the BoneRShol is connected to the BoneRClav
the BoneRClav is connected to the BoneSpineTop

the BoneLWrist is connected to the BoneLLoarm
the BoneLLoarm is connected to the BoneLUparm
the BoneLUparm is connected to the BoneLShol
the BoneLShol is connected to the BoneLClav
the BoneLClav is connected to the BoneSpineTop

the BoneHeadNub is connected to the BoneHead
the BoneHead is connected to the neckcontrol
the neckcontrol is connected to the BoneSpineTop
the BoneSpineTop is connected to the BoneSpine02
the BoneSpine02 is connected to the BoneSpine01
the BoneSpine01 is connected to the BoneSpine00
the BoneSpine00 is connected to the HIPS node

the BoneRToeNub is connected to the BoneRToe
the BoneRToe is connected to the BoneRFoot
the BoneRFoot is connected to the BoneRCalf
the BoneRHeel is connected to the BoneRCalf
the BoneRCalf is connected to the BoneRThigh
the BoneRThigh is connected to the BoneRHip
the BoneRHip is connected to the HIPS node

the BoneLToeNub is connected to the BoneLToe
the BoneLToe is connected to the BoneLFoot
the BoneLFoot is connected to the BoneLCalf
the BoneLHeel is connected to the BoneLCalf
the BoneLCalf is connected to the BoneLThigh
the BoneLThigh is connected to the BoneLHip
the BoneLHip is connected to the HIPS node

the HIPS node is connected to the origin node
the origin node is connected to the MASTER node

Oh, hear the word of someone who plays in GOD mode

post.author: Rayne
post.body:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wbTTyacC ... re=related


loool
